page.title: 15Lifestyles.
page.content:
{ A typical Saturday in my house}
On Saturday mornings I am awakened by my brother. He gets up at 6 o'clock to milk the cows. After breakfast Dad comes in. At about 10 o'clock Mum gets up and starts to cook the dinner. At this time I am usually playing with my friends, then at 12 o'clock I come back in for dinner.Dad likes to watch Saturday Sport on television, so he eats his dinner in the living room. After doing the washing up, we all watch television. After tea, I feed our cats which live in the farm buildings. All the family watches television together until bedtime.
